title: malicious activity
extract: A Trojan horse is a malicious program that is designed to appear as a legitimate program; once activated following installation, Trojans can execute their malicious functions. Spyware is a kind of malware that is designed to collect information and data on users and observe their activity without users' knowledge.
extract_html: A Trojan horse is a malicious program that is designed to appear as a legitimate program; once activated following installation, Trojans can execute their malicious functions. Spyware is a kind of malware that is designed to collect information and data on users and observe their activity without users' knowledge.
